short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Default search engine dedicated to game lovers who constantly search for games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is built for game lovers to have quick and easy access to search and get to the game page directly from the default search bar. By adding this extension to your browser, you can choose between two popular gaming sites and land your game search directly from the address bar to the results page on the gaming site. Speed up the process and have all the fun!

Learn more: https://www.games-search.com
